pageContext.claim: “The Democrats refuse to do anything on illegal immigration. They want open borders and they don't mind crime, they don't mind human trafficking, they don't mind drugs.”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats support tighter immigration controls, but they disagree with many of the policy proposals coming from Trump and his immigration adviser Stephen Miller. These comments from Trump suggest that immigration is tied to higher crime rates, but it's a Four Pinocchio claim. Most research shows that immigrants, whether they entered the United States legally or without authorization, commit crimes at lower rates than the native-born population.
